unit = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update format_dishes set unit = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM format_dishes where unit=#{enterprise}
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.name},'%') AND number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.number},'%') AND type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.type},'%') AND price LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.price},'%')

SELECT FROM format_dishes where unit=#{enterprise}
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.name},'%') AND number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.number},'%') AND type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.type},'%') AND price LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.price},'%') order by id desc limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}
